x_snc_devtools_technical_debt.description: The test "Deployer - Deployer Controller API - Start Deployment" validates that the API responds with an error if requested without user credentials. This test case is commented out because Yokohama and Zurich provide different responses in that case.
x_snc_devtools_technical_debt.short_description: Test "Deployer - Deployer Controller API - Start Deployment" needs refactoring
